_sText:
Map by bloodz.

Fortwars was made to play well and be fun. It stays true to the general low detailed aim maps, but still look as good as possible. (clean design)
Here is a video of some gameplay and a view of the map:
-YOUTUBE VIDEO- 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XWYWl5MKHTM 

-YOUTUBE VIDEO-
Credit for the video goes to Roadworks(WOOOOO ROADWORKS)-Video is posted on his account.

There are many ways to attack and different routes to take.
I tried to balance it evenly so awps arn't always the ones that win. 

Some Features :

Underground water systems that lead from base to base and to the middle
3D Skybox
Huge amounts of spawn Points
Many,many,many sniping points
Many various different areas to hide behind and take cover behind
sides are balanced and both forts are exactly the same.

MUCH MORE-Watch teh video

 
Over 30 hours of beta testing has been put into this map to make looks and gameplay just right. (Thanks beta testers)
Anyone who downloads gets a free ecookie!

If you have found glitches or have any suggestions AT ALL comment or add me to steam friends and tell me: blood_boyo
Please do not alter the map without permission. I'm happy for different logos to be added to my map as long as you ask and dont change the name!

If you redistribute to other sites, please give credit and also let me know.
